dn7:0.1_0: For a long time, Dīgha Tapassī!
dn7:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Kosambi, in Ghosita’s Monastery.
dn7:1.3_0: Now at that time two renunciates—
dn7:1.4_0: the wanderer Muṇḍiya and Jāliya the pupil of Dārupattika—came to the Buddha.
dn7:1.5_0: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, they stood to one side and said,
dn7:1.5_1: and told him what had happened, adding:
dn7:1.6_0: “Reverend Gotama, are the soul and the body the same thing, or they are different things?”
dn7:1.7_0: “Well then, reverends, listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
